New York University Archives
Herman Emil Mantel Collection of NYU Memorabilia
Mantel, Herman Emil
Johnson, Susan
MC.267
.25 Linear Feet in 1 half manuscript box
1908-1909, 1916, undated Materials are in English. Herman Emil Mantel (d. 1964) was a multi-degree graduate of New York University, earning his Bachelor of Arts degree in 1908, Master of Arts degree in 1909, and PhD in 1916. He went on to teach and become an administator at Bronx High School of Science. This collection contains 1908 class day booklets and a commencement program, a 1909 Masters in Arts diploma, a 1916 commencement program, and undated photograph of Mantel. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access. 1
Scope and Contents
The Herman Emil Mantel Collection of NYU Memorabilia contains 1908 class day booklets and a commencement program, Mantel's 1909 Masters in Arts diploma, a 1916 commencement program, and an undated portrait of Mantel.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Biographical Note
Herman Emil Mantel (d. 1964) graduated from New York University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1908, Master of Arts degree in 1909, and PhD in 1916. Mantel taught and was an administrator at the Bronx High School of Science. The Herman E. Mantel Library was dedicated at the Bronx High School of Science in 1966.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact university-archives@nyu.edu
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Susan Johnson, October 2016. The accession number associated with this gift is 2018.036
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Herman Emil Mantel Collection of NYU Memorabilia; MC 267; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
Materials were placed in acid-free folders and box, and described on the collection-level. Fragile materials were placed in protective enclosures within the folders and labeled as fragile.
Commencement ceremonies Programs (documents). Black-and-white photographs. Johnson, Susan New York University. College of Arts and Science
